title: Scrape pipeline should return an error (not panic) when OPENROUTER_API_KEY is unset
description: server/src/scraping/mod.rs:138 uses .expect() on CachingAiClient::from_env(), which panics and crashes the server if OPENROUTER_API_KEY is missing. Since auto-tagging has continues_on_failure: true, the intent is clearly for it to be optional. Should return an error to the caller rather than panicking.
